DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate whether ( 1 ) target smoke alarm education , ( 2 ) general fire safety education smoke alarm component , ( 3 ) basic fire safety education , ( 4 ) unrelated intervention effective way improve smoke alarm maintenance function .
DOC.brief_title: Research Improve Smoke Alarm Functioning Maintenance
